mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_codeinfo WHERE up_cd IN (SELECT cd FROM tbl_codeinfo WHERE up_cd = 'stack_cd') OR up_cd = 'stack_cd';

SELECT a.*, COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT b.stack_cd ORDER BY b.stack_cd SEPARATOR ','), '') AS skills, COALESCE(f.file_url, '') AS fileUrl, COUNT(g.l_no) AS scrapCnt, COUNT(h.l_no) AS bookmarkCnt FROM tbl_job_open a LEFT JOIN tbl_job_open_stack b ON a.j_no = b.j_no LEFT JOIN tbl_file f ON a.id = f.file_ref_id AND f.file_gbn_cd = 100 LEFT JOIN tbl_likes g ON a.j_no = g.cj_no AND g.l_gbn_cd = 'S' AND g.id = 'user1' LEFT JOIN tbl_likes h ON a.j_no = h.cj_no AND h.l_gbn_cd = 'B' AND h.id = 'user1' GROUP BY a.j_no LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
